mmH1aQHfMKXgLcZEX.name: Seriously Calamity-Prone
mmH1aQHfMKXgLcZEX.notes: Each level reduces the number of Excess Points (default: 5) which give a +1 bonus on Calamity rolls by 1.

mb0jA-T1C3Ihh1bah.name: Slower Magical Recovery
mb0jA-T1C3Ihh1bah.notes: Each level subtracts -25% from your Recharge Rate (default: 8 -2/lvl).

ttGdit43dTrdpaXVl.name: Increased Threshold
ttGdit43dTrdpaXVl.notes: You can cast longer without needing to roll for Calamity. Increases Thresh by 20%/lvl (default: Thr 30 +6/lv)

tl5nTCtBP0k2LZalR.name: Safer Magical Excess
tl5nTCtBP0k2LZalR.notes: You tend to produce less severe calamities. Each level doubles the number of excess Tally Points (default: 5) that will give +1 to Calamity rolls.

t_6ZOa0TmmSuW2AwK.name: Rapid Magical Recovery
t_6ZOa0TmmSuW2AwK.notes: You recover faster from spellcasting. Each level adds +25% to your Recharge Rate (default: RR 8 +2/lvl).
